thread.title: Outrage as young woman URINATES on Koran then BURNS it in bizarre ‘protest’
thread.title_full: Outrage as young woman URINATES on Koran then BURNS it in bizarre ‘protest’

title: Outrage as young woman URINATES on Koran then BURNS it in bizarre ‘protest’
text:
“I will bump off anybody who gets in my way” The woman 
Police are reported to be investigating a video of the incident after receiving numerous complaints. 
The 12-minute video was shot in woods in Slovakia and the girl stands in front of a Slovakian flag – suggesting she is a Slovakian nationalist. 
Speaking to the camera, she brands Muslims "parasites" and says: "I will hunt you all step by step. 
YOUTUBE BURNING DESIRE: The woman proudly displays the lighter fluid to the camera 
YOUTUBE FIRE: The woman burns pages from the Koran 
“No matter if it is a woman, child or man – I will bump off anybody who gets in my way. 
"I do not care about the criminal complaints. It will not stop me. 
“I have a message for everybody, including the police – nobody will stop me." 
YOUTUBE URINE TROUBLE: The woman has reportedly fled after the incident was reported Burka bans across Europe Thursday, 22nd December 2016 Which European countries have some kind of ban on Islamic face coverings, such as the hijab, niqab and burka? 1 / 14 GETTY France: Became first country in Europe to ban the burka in April 2011, with a penalty fine of 150 euro 
The video has gone viral in Eastern Europe. 
Despite the woman’s brazen claims, she has reportedly fled to Finland after complaints were made. 
Eight people died in protests after a controversial US pastor burned copies of the Koran a few years ago. Related articles
